result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin Dean Littlewolf was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin Dean Littlewolf

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

Defendant Justin Dean Littlewolf in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No contest plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Def. guilty.  Court imposes sentence.

Count 1:
$443.00 costs, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.  Apply Bond
Paperwork handed in court.
Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Tsai stands mute.  Court enters Not Guilty plea- Set for Trial.  Bond continued.
Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Requests 2 week reset.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for September 22, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Tsai states matter is not resolved.  Requests two week reset to try and resolve matter.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for September 4, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Tsai received offer from DA but needs time to discuss offer w/DE.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Tsai just assigned last week.  Contact has been made with defendant.  Auth within 10 days.  Request 2 week continuance.  State has no objection.  Bond continues.  Offer has been received.  Return date scheduled for July 29, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 07-10-2015 09:00 am.
Return date at 07-16-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Justin Dean Littlewolf in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  State requests additional conditions of bond.  DE objects.  Bond continued.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No violent/abusive contact w/C.L.B.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 10, 2015 at 09:00 am.  Return date scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
